job_title: Learning Technology Specialist in Charlotte, NC
pros: Great company culture and you really feel like your making a difference.
cons: I have no complaints working here.

job_title: Clinical Nursing Instructor in Charlotte, NC
pros: I love working with the students and being involved with committees. Full time staff are very welcoming and inclusive
cons: Working more hours than paid for

pros: work-life balance, engaging staff and faculty, education outcomes
cons: no advancement, increased faculty-staff turnover with administration

pros: Healthcare benefits, paid time off and employee discounts.
cons: High turnover, limited advancement opportunities, leadership creates an environment of distrust and oppression. Employees become targets if they disagree with the provost, and many have left because of intimidation.
